1.0.0.name: wordpress/addthis-welcome
1.0.0.description:
Welcome visitors with a personalized greeting based on their social network preferences. Invite them to take specific actions like sharing, following, or visiting a page.

Optionally, sign up for a free AddThis.com account to see how your visitors are sharing your content: which services they're using for sharing, which content is shared the most, and more.

AddThis Blog | Privacy Policy
